Depends a little bit on what you are aiming at: do you mean taking a
taught=
 course, doing a PhD or getting hired as a lecturer? Or do you
mean the pri=
vate sector?

I did my MSc at the University of Sussex, Brighton, UK. They =
have a
very strong group in the area, especially when it comes to evolving
=
neural nets for autonomous agents (as opposed to pure pattern
recognition),=
 and a lot of interdisciplinarity - people from biology,
philosophy and inf=
ormatics really take an interest in each other's
work. Brighton is a nice p=
lace to live as well.

Julian
